meta.title: Ornamental Aluminum Fence Installation Toledo OH | Ghareeb Fencing
meta.description: Professional ornamental aluminum fence installation in Toledo. Elegant, rust-free, low maintenance. Perfect for pools and front yards. Free quotes.

hero.headline: Ornamental Aluminum Fence Installation
hero.description: Timeless elegance meets modern durability. Ornamental aluminum fencing adds curb appeal while providing security. Rust-free, maintenance-free, and built to last.

intro.headline: Why Choose Aluminum Fencing?
intro.content: Ornamental aluminum fencing combines classic wrought-iron aesthetics with modern materials that never rust. It's the perfect choice for front yards, pools, and anywhere you want elegant visibility without maintenance headaches.
intro.content2: Unlike traditional iron fencing, aluminum won't rust, peel, or require painting. It maintains its beauty for decades with zero maintenance.
benefits: Classic wrought-iron look without the upkeep

styles.headline: Aluminum Fence Styles We Install
styles.subheadline: Available in black, bronze, and white. Multiple heights and picket styles.

items.name: Classic Flat Top
items.description: Traditional look with flat top rails. Perfect for front yards and property lines.

items.name: Spear Top
items.description: Decorative finials add elegance and security. Popular for front yards.

items.name: Pool Fence
items.description: Code-compliant pool fencing with self-closing gates. Safety meets style.

comparison.headline: Aluminum Fence Options: Good / Better / Best
comparison.subheadline: All options include lifetime rust-free warranty

tiers.name: Good
tiers.subtitle: Residential Flat Top
tiers.description: Standard residential aluminum with flat top style. Black color, 4ft height. Lifetime rust-free warranty.

tiers.name: Better
tiers.subtitle: Premium Residential
tiers.description: Heavy-duty grade with flat or spear top. Black, bronze, or white. 4-5ft heights with self-closing hinges.

tiers.name: Best
tiers.subtitle: Commercial Grade
tiers.description: Commercial-grade ornamental aluminum. Spear tops, custom heights to 6ft. Premium hardware and puppy picket option.

cta.headline: Ready for Your Aluminum Fence?
cta.description: Get a free quote for ornamental aluminum fence installation. We'll help you choose the perfect style for your property.
